channel.title: Kylin Realty Homes
channel.description: Recent content on Kylin Realty Homes

item.title: Buying a home with a well?
item.description: Are you buying a house that is on a well? A home inspection may not give all the information that you need.

item.title: buying your first home
item.description: Ready to buy your first home? Brace yourself. It is going to be bumpy. It’s also going to be a challenging and stressful time. But it doesn’t have to be. Sit down with your agent and understand the overall process. If you think the only thing your agent does is tour the house with you and gives comments on the house like what you see on House Hunters, then you are mistaken.

item.title: Points
item.description: Want to know what it means when a loan officer talks about points?

item.title: Contact
item.description: Have a question? Feel free to send a message. Your Name Email Address An email address is required. Message This form provided by https://formspree.io.
